how_it_works.title: How LazyNests Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Our AI-powered system handles everything from search to booking, giving you the advantage in competitive housing markets.
how_it_works.step1.title: Searches for your Dream House
how_it_works.step1.description: Our AI continuously monitors for new listings that match your criteria, 24/7. Sleep peacefully knowing you'll never miss the perfect home again.
how_it_works.step2.title: Scores Matches with AI
how_it_works.step2.description: Advanced algorithms qualify properties based on your preferences. Save hours of scrolling and get your evenings back for what matters.
how_it_works.step3.title: Beat the Crowd - Responds to new matches Instantly
how_it_works.step3.description: Get only the best matches delivered to you. No more wasted time on unsuitable properties—just the homes you'll love.
how_it_works.step4.title: Books Viewings Automatically

how_it_works.edge.title: Being first increases your chances by up to 300%
how_it_works.edge.description: In competitive markets, the first viewer often gets the house. Let LazyNests give you that edge.

cta.title: Ready to Find Your Dream Home?
cta.subtitle: Let our AI assistant do the hard work while you relax. Start your house-hunting journey today.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? We've got answers. Here are some of the most common things we get asked.
faq.a1: Our AI-powered system continuously scans the largest real estate platform in the Netherlands for new listings that match your specific criteria. It works 24/7 so you never miss an opportunity.
faq.a2: LazyNest goes beyond simple keyword matching. Our AI analyzes property details, descriptions, and even photos to qualify listings based on your nuanced preferences, ensuring you only see the most relevant homes.
faq.a3: Once a perfect match is found and qualified, our system can initiate the viewing request process with the real estate agent on your behalf. This speed is crucial in a competitive market, putting you first in line.
faq.a4: LazyNest offers a free trial to help you get started—no credit card required. After the trial, we have affordable subscription plans based on the intensity of your search and the features you need. Try it risk-free today!
faq.q5: What gives me a competitive edge?
faq.a5: Speed and precision. By automating the search and qualification process, LazyNest gets you in the door faster than anyone else. In markets where properties are sold within days, being the first to view and make an offer can make all the difference.
faq.a6: We're so confident you'll love LazyNest that we offer a 'No Match, Money Back' guarantee. If we don't find you a qualified match within your first month, we'll refund your subscription—no questions asked.
faq.a7: Absolutely. We take your privacy seriously. Your data is encrypted, never sold to third parties, and only used to find your perfect home. We're GDPR compliant and transparent about how we handle your information.
faq.q8: How do you contact realtors on my behalf?
faq.a8: Once you approve a property match, our system sends professional, personalized viewing requests directly to the listing agent using your contact information. You remain in full control—we just make you faster.
